curam.util.persistence.message.impl

Class VALIDATIONExceptionCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.persistence.message.impl.VALIDATIONExceptionCreator

  • public final class VALIDATIONExceptionCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create strongly-typed exceptions from the VALIDATION message catalog.
